|blank_info = 46-58580 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1267564 |website = http://www.shermansd.com/ |footnotes = }} Sherman is a town in the far eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Minnehaha County, and 81 people lived there at the 2020 census. Sherman became a town in 1888. ==References== Category:Towns in South Dakota Category:1888 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in Dakota Territory
